title: Understanding Preattentive Processing
text: Preattentive processing helps people grasp information quickly before they even consciously analyze it. Think about visual elements you've noticed at a glance without effort.

title: Role of Simplicity
text: Consider how complexity or simplicity in design affects visibility and focus. What role might simplification play in capturing attention preattentively?

title: Making One Element Stand Out
text: Think about how certain elements can draw the viewer's eye more effectively when there aren't many competing elements. How can one element be emphasized amid simplicity?
